On 8 Jul 2006, at 03:25, Kent Beck wrote:
> From the
> implementation in TestClassMethodsRunner.invokeTestMethod() it  
> looks like
> the test instance cannot escape, and is available for garbage  
> collection
> after the test runs. This behavior is not (yet?) part of the API,  
> however.

Lets hope that statements from the 2 horses mouths encourage test- 
runners to do the right thing.

Thanks Kent and David

Duncan
